website_summaries.verdict: These lightweight plastic hurdles are ideal for speed and agility training and compact enough to use in small spaces.
pros: Caps on the ends prevent the hurdles from scratching floors
cons: They don't come with a carrying case or strap
Some users have said they were smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Used twice and broke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hurdles for my kids to work on footwork for various sports. It's been cold here so my son has only used them once. He used them for some some agility drills and seemed happy. This morning, before school -- my daughter was using them for some basketball dribbling drills and the ball hit one of the legs and this happened. (See photo) I understand that these are inexpensive -- but they should be able to withstand a basketball or a foot landing on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lax Dad

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: The hurdles were delivered on time. The box was not completely taped but all 5 hurdles arrived. The hurdles came wrapped in a trash bag...they are also fairly flimsy and fragile, borderline brittle. I do not expect them to last very long. With that said they are the best price, with the most reviews with an ok rating (now i understand why).
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: These are great hurdles and helped our young goal keeper get more agile
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy. Our 100yo goal keeper needed something to help her be more agile and these hurdles did the trick. Of course the skills training has to be there, but these tools really put the spring in her step. I would recommend these to everyone, and they are MUCH BETTER built than the Skilz equivalent. We use them for skills training while soccer is on hold due to Covid-19. Our kids use these in a myriad of ways! Great tools for players and coaches alike. These are must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Manzano

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The hurdles are light weight, but the material is very form and sturdy. They are exactly how it was pictured in the photo. I would definitely recommend! I bought 2 sets of the 6” I should have done one 6” and one 9”, cannot recall seeing the option to choose another height though. I wished that it came with a nice drawstring bag to store them in. They arrived in a plastic which was in the amazon box. For the last point I give 4 stars because it doesn’t come I. A bag that I can store them in.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These were a great purchase, they are light, bright and durable. Only con would be they didn't come with a way to bind them together for transporting to and from workouts. I used a Velcro strap tired to one and wrapped them together. All in all I'm pleased and will look to order when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: JTREPRODUCTIONS

customer_reviews.title: Clearly a used item...
customer_reviews.text: Well, they all made it, and based on the wreck that was the box, 5 different shipping labels and a beat in side, that is saying something. Upon opening the box I found the product tied in a trash bag. As the number of previous customer labels and packaging would show, this was not a new item sold to me. They are all in one piece, but when stood on a flat surface they are wobbly as the legs are not even. As these are purely for a toddler obstacle course, high performance is not necessary, but I am a little concerned that the wobble will be a hazard. Will debate on returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mullikin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again bc of value for price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for agility and conditioning for a 12u fastpitch team. We've used them a couple of times and so far so good. They do seem like they may break at some point, but they are made to be jumped over, not jumped on. Good value for the money, but very unweildy to carry and store. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CoastalBackwoods

customer_reviews.title: Terrible exercise mini hurdles.
customer_reviews.text: The items were not well designed or constructed. The vary in height, are not stable at all as the rouk back and forth. Hard to store because they vary in size and curvature. No two are the same. Have to hold them down by installing bolts in the end. No one should buy this item!
customer_reviews.author: ken taylor

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These have held up to the daily abuse of my club's soccer practices. The players are definitely not concerned about mistreating them, but so far none have broken. I've had other brands that cost more but got broken on a somewhat regular basis; these have lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Worst product on earth. Absolute junk.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. This company should be ashamed of themselves. Not a single hurdle matched another, all being uneven and bent. After at least trying them, one was stepped on and broke. Cheaply made. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ghilon

customer_reviews.title: They are worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The hurdles are made from hard plastic. I use them in the sand and on grass. No complaints and I’ve used them a bunch of times. They are worth getting
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: They are light in weight and easy to store on our wall storage system
customer_reviews.text: Hurdles do not take up a lot of space. They are light in weight and easy to store on our wall storage system. Would recommend this product to others
customer_reviews.author: Aiga Performance

customer_reviews.title: Great hurdles for agility and quickness
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hurdles to help train my athletes. They are perfect for quickness and agility drills. Only issue I have with them - the rubber backings on the legs keeps falling off. Once these fall off - the hurdles don't sit as well on the ground. I wish they came glued on... will probably do this with the remaining rubber leg cuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and durable I just throw them in the back of my car and have been great! I’m a little OCD and just wished they could have come in 6 instead of 5 but that’s minor
customer_reviews.author: Your friendly neighbor

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: My husband is happy with them they came a bit scratched up but he is okay with that they are exactly as discribed minus the scratch here and there
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I mean these are pretty light weight and plastic
customer_reviews.text: I mean these are pretty light weight and plastic. I have not broke one yet, so they are doing their job so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Items delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: These are useless. They came bent/deformed at the legs for every single unit, so they sit very low and crooked
customer_reviews.author: Rylan Delap

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the price. I use these for U12 girls soccer team, and they're a great size. However they're cheaply made, and if they were stepped on by an adult or older kid, they would break. But they we're a great for the price. I like them alot.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Not great about them but they're good forbthe home collection. They do their job.
customer_reviews.author: ShayMarie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last one practice
customer_reviews.text: Well, you buy a hurdle, so you expect that can handle at least one jump on it, but no, it can’t . How can you train kids if hurdles are made with such terrible product? If you want to buy a product that last more than one practice, find another one.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Marques

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old is into running and jumping hurdles in her back yard. These were a perfect gift for her, uses frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Ann E

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, inexpensive and excellent quality hurdles.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are so versatile for my clients as a personal trainer. We use them in conditioning and drills in soccer, and workouts in boot camp. They are great quality and a great price. I'm glad I purchased these and will probably purchase the taller set next.
customer_reviews.author: William Michael Becher

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, they’re hurdles. You jump, hop, and run over them.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: very light i wish they weighted it a little on the bottom. Kicks over easily.
customer_reviews.text: very light i wish they weighted it a little on the bottom. Kicks over easily.
customer_reviews.author: shirley f

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed for off season training. They are light weight, durable and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ctacks16

customer_reviews.title: Something
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok . It wobbles and I don’t like it but it’s light and I like that part . But I wouldn’t buy it again .
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It will be better if more weight is added to make it more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Concept User

customer_reviews.title: I do like doing the cross over work on them but jumping ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these to try to open my hips and to do some jumping. I do like doing the cross over work on them but jumping has not been as easy. This is not because of the hurdles but because I am old.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Our boys really like them!
customer_reviews.text: 5 hurdle set is a fun addition to our 7 and 9yo boys backyard football “combine”! Just wish they were a little bit less money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and light
customer_reviews.text: Durable and light. This product works perfect for agility needs
customer_reviews.author: JoannaD

customer_reviews.title: good exactly what is says it is- and good for ...
customer_reviews.text: good exactly what is says it is- and good for beach workout :) doesnt rust and sand comes off easy- would have been awesome if they sold a bag to carry these in though- only downside is lugging them around.
customer_reviews.author: ana vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Stick check
customer_reviews.text: Helped my girls lacrosse to conference for the 1st time! :)
customer_reviews.author: Noble 1

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item. Use them for football training all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Always NY

customer_reviews.title: These work for their intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and as advertised. They are made of plastic and are easy to carry. They serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Brown

customer_reviews.title: They've been excellent. Wonderful service and product
customer_reviews.text: Received shipping quickly. They've been excellent. Wonderful service and product. Great price. Definitely plan to purchase from you again. Thanks a bunch. (pastd2015) Performance Athleticism Skills Training Development Sincerely J. Jones
customer_reviews.author: JEROME L. JONES

customer_reviews.title: speed drills
customer_reviews.text: Great for foot work and agility. A reasonable price product to incorporate to workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying/hurdles twisted and misshapen
customer_reviews.text: Bought these hurdles to use for pediatric physical therapy treatments. They are so contorted and misshapen that most of the hurdles do not even set-up on the floor. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: douglas t.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These wickets are extremely durable. They must have heard and seen some of the reviews because the packaging was not in trash bags but boxes.
customer_reviews.author: BigUncle

customer_reviews.title: Received 5 instead of 6
customer_reviews.text: The hurdles are nice but I only received 5 instead of 6. Really?
customer_reviews.author: Teodor Florea

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are plastic but much more durable than I expected. Really like these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: These hurdles were exactly what we wanted. They are used for physical exercise training for a person with Parkinson's disease and are exactly the right thing at the right price. Were recommend by our physical therapist.
customer_reviews.author: sheba

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: I used this for soccer , it’s any alright product
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, light weight. Perfect for our weightroom
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys use these for multiple sport training and they really have helped with their agility.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The specs are uneven. The supports are curved inwards. They are a hazard. Terrible off-brand product.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sons love having these to run and hop over in our backyard obstacle courses.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Expectation did not match reality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the pictures do not match the product that was sent. The shape of the item received is different (short with little curve and cheaply made). This feels like a bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: Keyton Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be holding up nicely. You can use them in so many different patterns. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler McCray

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: thing i most disliked about this is that it came in a cheap white trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were a little wider but they're great and get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Guy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: won't stay standing in longer grass. really made for very short grass or turf fields.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. it comes in handy in a physical therapy setting
customer_reviews.author: Jellybean

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Versatile, light weight, but heavy enough to do what it is suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Doug H

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I expected that these would be heavier duty than they are but they work perfectly for agilities for the kids we are using them with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Bought these awhile ago I know... but a few months after purchasing they some how started to bend in on themselves. Now they are trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: "Pick-em up and put-em down!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of equipment, light weight and practical, excellence value. Perfect addition for circuit training. What more could I say?
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: They serve their purpose well. Lightweight and easy to transport. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Solid quality. Probably a bit better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: matcon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: One came missing the black end cap, but other than that it was great
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Kirk

customer_reviews.title: and is very fun.
customer_reviews.text: We are using the hurdles to train for increased speed and power. Training with these don't require large space, and is very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Aizenmentch

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my high school football player. He likes it, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Able to use them for myself and also for my athletes at the college I coach at!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for use at home or in the gym.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. The hurdles are sturdy and are the perfect height for our speed and agility drills. Very good value, as well since we've seen others that are more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: All 10 black plastic caps covering the tip of each hurdle were cracked!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Quiles

customer_reviews.title: Hurdles are great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my advance and college kids and little kids. The hurdles are great and needed for fitness any sport. If this review helped you please give a thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just missing a piece.
customer_reviews.text: One of them is missing the black "cap" on it, but other than that, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: alexandrea downing

customer_reviews.title: Ordered one set of five hurdles and was missing 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one set of five hurdles and was missing 7 black caps...Only two were on the hurdles and found one in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: And my kids love training with them
customer_reviews.text: They came on time. And my kids love training with them
customer_reviews.author: Trey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bit small but it is fine great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They good but i have to get more of them
customer_reviews.author: Tavon Sol

customer_reviews.title: could be heavier so they don't move so easily if bumped
customer_reviews.text: These are a good hurdle and well-made. However, if any part of your foot barely touches the hurdle it flips and moves. It would be better if they were a little heavier weight, but they are made like other hurdles I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: not for long term sun exposure
customer_reviews.text: Left them outside on a hot day on turf grass and they melted and lost shape. End caps come off all the time. Keep them out of the sun. Glue the caps on, should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: TC San Diego CA

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool to work on footwork
customer_reviews.text: Good training tool to work on footwork. These need to be part of any footwork training program in my opinion. This product has held up well and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jody D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you don't make the mistake I did and check the height. My fault, but they are actually working very well in combination with the other training tools I am using. Built very well and the material looks durable and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: They were delivered on-time. The look exactly as they ...
customer_reviews.text: They were delivered on-time. The look exactly as they appear in the pictures and i look forward to purchasing some more.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Speed Hurdles
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Have used them a lot for youth training. A pack of eight would be ideal. Will probably order more.
customer_reviews.author: R Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: IT IS WHAT IT SAID IT IS... my thoughts didn't match 😂
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is... I WAS THINKING they were bigger
customer_reviews.author: Stacie C.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a double version, they are working as expected. Only gripe is through shipping, the box was a little damaged in transit. Items arrived undamaged. Plastic on end of one hurdle was missing. A little black tape worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Poooor quality
customer_reviews.text: 3 of these hurdles were missing the caps on the end of the tubing. But much worse than that is four of the hurdles were bent wrong and one side sits 3inches off the ground when they laid down. Pure junk.
customer_reviews.author: David Carlson

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations 6" Speed Training Hurdles - Pack of 5
product_meta.description: This 5-piece set of 6" speed hurdles is great for speed trainings. Perfect for training for sports and improving footwork.
feature_bullets: Pack of 5 six inch speed hurdles
Improve foot-speed and tone leg muscles
